If I could rearrange the stars, I'd put your smile next to mine.
Are you a magician? Because whenever I look at you, everyone else disappears.
Your name means pomegranate-so I guess sweetness is in you.
The bus was moving, but time seemed to pause the moment I noticed you.
When I knew that our lab schedule is the same, I became the luckiest person on the planet.
Stars are pretty, but you're my favorite constellation.
If vibes were movies, you'd be the one I rewatch.
I must be a snowflake, because I've fallen for you.
If beauty were time, you'd be an eternity.
